intro: Homalachne, commonly known as the silverleaf shrub, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Acanthaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Pacific Islands. The plants typically have small, lance-shaped leaves that are covered in a fine, silvery pubescence, giving them their common name.
